lexUnit.name: characterize.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a feature or quality) be characteristic of.

sentence.text: As Mommsen ( 1974 , p. 37 ) observed : ` Weber never envisaged any other world than his own , which was largely characterized by the rivalry of nation states . "
